channel.title: Homes on Vishwas's website
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Vishwas's website

item.description: Biography I’m Vishwas, from Robert Bosch Centre for Cyber-Physical Systems, Indian Institute of Science. I would like to call myself as Hardware design engineer as I work on designing and programming of electronics hardware to solve real-world problems. Previously I worked as an Embedded Hardware Engineer in Openwater.in a spin-off startup from Instrumentation and Applied Physics department of Indian Institue of Science, Bangalore. I love experimenting and making (I would like to call myself a Maker also.

item.title: Projects
item.description: IGo-Advanced Driver Assist System February 2019 to March 2019 ICense February 2019 to March 2019 Smart Soft Switch November 2018 to January 2019 Smart switch based on Infineon’s CoolMOS MOSFET for spark-free switching of drones and electric vehicles IEncode Intelligent Encoder for Industrial Motors Aug. 2018 to Sept. 2018 Predictive maintenance of Industrial motors using Infineon’s high precision 3D magnetic sensor TLE-493D SewerSway Sept. 2018 to Present

item.title: Achievements
item.description: CPDM, IISc REIMAGINE WASTE Hackathon ReImagine Waste, CPDM, IISc. Sept. 2018 Won the special prize in the hackathon Sensing the world in all three dimensions Infineon Technologies and Hackster.io Sept. 2018 Won best project award in industrial category. International Ericsson Innovation Awards May 2017 Ericsson Semifinalist in the International Ericsson Awards 2017. MediaTek International IoT Challenge Feb. MediaTek and Angelhack 2017 - 3rd Prize CeBIT IoT Hackathon Dec. 2016 CeBIT India Winner of national level IoT hackathon
